name: Rise And Fall: Online
description:
Online Application of the physical board game "Rise and Fall" from Christophe Boelinger edited by Ludically.

Camera control:

Keys: Arrows +/- shift key (Space is OK button)

Mouse: Right button +/- Control key

Open Alpha v 0.2.4:

- User security and access management

- Running on dedicated AKS infrastructure

- Website and mail services

- Improved online game stability

-Know issues: (much more unknown)

- Map creation issue with sea tiles

- 5 sec Lag when AI initialize before placing the first meeple

- AI is completely broken and useless

- Visual Glitch on card orders

- Fatal error when forfeiting game (armless just reload)
